vb4:49.4: Anuppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya chandaṁ janeti, vāyamati, vīriyaṁ ārabhati, cittaṁ paggaṇhāti, padahati.

vb4:50.5: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
vb4:51.2: Idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi, savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
vb4:51.3: Vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā, ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ, cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
vb4:51.4: Pītiyā ca virāgā, upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca sampajāno, sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedeti, yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti—“upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti, tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
vb4:51.5: Sukhassa ca pahānā, dukkhassa ca pahānā, pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā, adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
vb4:56.2: Avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā dhammā, tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavāni, avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā, sāsavā ca kusalākusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ vipākā, ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā, sabbañca rūpaṁ—
vb4:58.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā, vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti sammādiṭṭhi …pe… sammāsamādhi.
vb4:59.2: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb4:60.2: Yo takko vitakko …pe… sammāsaṅkappo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb4:61.2: Yā catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṁ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammāvācā maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb4:62.2: Yā tīhi kāyaduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṁ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammākammanto maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb4:63.2: Yā micchā ājīvā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṁ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto sammāājīvo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb4:64.2: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho …pe… sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb4:65.2: Yā sati anussati …pe… sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb4:66.2: Yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti …pe… sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—

vb4:82.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā, vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti—
vb4:85.2: Avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā dhammā, tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavāni, avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā, sāsavā ca kusalākusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ vipākā, ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā, sabbañca rūpaṁ—
vb4:87.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā, vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hoti—
vb4:88.2: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb4:89.2: Yo takko vitakko …pe… sammāsaṅkappo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb4:90.2: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho …pe… sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb4:91.2: Yā sati anussati …pe… sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb4:92.2: Yā cittassa ṭhiti …pe… sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb4:93.2: Taṇhā ca, avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā dhammā, tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavāni, avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā—
vb4:94.2: Sāsavā kusalākusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ vipākā, ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā, sabbañca rūpaṁ—
vb4:95.2: Taṇhāya ca, avasesānañca kilesānaṁ, avasesānañca akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ, tiṇṇañca kusalamūlānaṁ sāsavānaṁ, avasesānañca sāsavānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānaṁ—
vb4:96.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā, vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hoti—
vb4:99.2: Avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā dhammā, tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavāni, avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā, sāsavā ca kusalākusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ vipākā, ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā, sabbañca rūpaṁ—
vb4:101.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.
vb4:102.2: Taṇhā ca, avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā dhammā, tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavāni, avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā—
vb4:103.2: Sāsavā kusalākusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ vipākā, ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā, sabbañca rūpaṁ—
vb4:104.2: Taṇhāya ca, avasesānañca kilesānaṁ, avasesānañca akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ, tiṇṇañca kusalamūlānaṁ sāsavānaṁ, avasesānañca sāsavānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānaṁ—
vb4:105.2: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.
vb4:107.2: dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ, dukkhasamudayaṁ ariyasaccaṁ, dukkhanirodhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ.
vb4:108.1: Catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā …pe… kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?
vb4:109.4: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā kusalaṁ, siyā akusalaṁ, siyā abyākataṁ.
vb4:110.1: Dve saccā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
vb4:110.3: “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi.
vb4:110.4: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttan”tipi.
vb4:111.3: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā vipākaṁ, siyā vipākadhammadhammaṁ, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ.
vb4:114.3: Maggasaccaṁ siyā savitakkasavicāraṁ, siyā avitakkavicāramattaṁ, siyā avitakkaavicāraṁ.
vb4:114.4: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā savitakkasavicāraṁ, siyā avitakkavicāramattaṁ, siyā avitakkaavicāraṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“savitakkasavicāran”tipi, “avitakkavicāramattan”tipi, “avitakkaavicāran”tipi.
vb4:115.1: Dve saccā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā.
vb4:115.4: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā pītisahagataṁ, siyā sukhasahagataṁ, siyā upekkhāsahagataṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“pītisahagatan”tipi, “sukhasahagatan”tipi, “upekkhāsahagatan”tipi.
vb4:116.1: Dve saccā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā.
vb4:116.2: Samudayasaccaṁ siyā dassanena pahātabbaṁ, siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ.
vb4:116.3: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā dassanena pahātabbaṁ, siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ, siyā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ.
vb4:117.1: Dve saccā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā.
vb4:117.2: Samudayasaccaṁ siyā dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ, siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ.
vb4:117.3: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ, siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ, siyā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ.
vb4:121.3: Samudayasaccaṁ siyā parittārammaṇaṁ, siyā mahaggatārammaṇaṁ na appamāṇārammaṇaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“parittārammaṇan”tipi, “mahaggatārammaṇan”tipi.
vb4:121.4: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā parittārammaṇaṁ, siyā mahaggatārammaṇaṁ, siyā appamāṇārammaṇaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“parittārammaṇan”tipi, “mahaggatārammaṇan”tipi, “appamāṇārammaṇan”tipi.
vb4:123.3: Dve saccā siyā micchattaniyatā, siyā aniyatā.
vb4:124.4: Maggasaccaṁ na maggārammaṇaṁ maggahetukaṁ, siyā maggādhipati, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“maggādhipatī”ti.
vb4:124.5: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā maggārammaṇaṁ na maggahetukaṁ, siyā maggādhipati, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“maggārammaṇan”tipi, “maggādhipatī”tipi.
vb4:125.1: Dve saccā siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, na vattabbā—
vb4:125.5: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā uppannaṁ, siyā anuppannaṁ, siyā uppādi.
vb4:126.1: Tīṇi saccāni siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā.
vb4:127.4: Dve saccā siyā atītārammaṇā, siyā anāgatārammaṇā, siyā paccuppannārammaṇā, siyā na vattabbā—“atītārammaṇā”tipi, “anāgatārammaṇā”tipi, “paccuppannārammaṇā”tipi.
vb4:128.2: Tīṇi saccāni siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā.
vb4:129.3: Samudayasaccaṁ siyā ajjhattārammaṇaṁ, siyā bahiddhārammaṇaṁ, siyā ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṁ.
vb4:129.4: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā ajjhattārammaṇaṁ, siyā bahiddhārammaṇaṁ, siyā ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“ajjhattārammaṇan”tipi, “bahiddhārammaṇan”tipi, “ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇan”tipi.
vb4:130.2: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā sanidassanasappaṭighaṁ, siyā anidassanasappaṭighaṁ, siyā anidassanaappaṭighaṁ.
vb4:131.3: Dve saccā siyā hetū, siyā na hetū.
vb4:131.13: Maggasaccaṁ siyā hetu ceva sahetukañca, siyā sahetukañceva na ca hetu.
vb4:131.14: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā hetu ceva sahetukañca, siyā sahetukañceva na ca hetu, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“hetu ceva sahetukañcā”tipi, “sahetukañceva na ca hetū”tipi.
vb4:131.18: Maggasaccaṁ siyā hetu ceva hetusampayuttañca, siyā hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetu.
vb4:131.19: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā hetu ceva hetusampayuttañca, siyā hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetu, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“hetu ceva hetusampayuttañcā”tipi, “hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetū”tipi.
vb4:131.23: Maggasaccaṁ siyā na hetusahetukaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“na hetusahetukan”tipi, “na hetuahetukan”tipi.
vb4:131.24: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā na hetusahetukaṁ, siyā na hetuahetukaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“na hetusahetukan”tipi, “na hetuahetukan”tipi.
vb4:133.3: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā āsavo, siyā no āsavo.
vb4:133.11: “āsavā ceva sāsavā cā”tipi, “sāsavā ceva no ca āsavā”tipi.
vb4:133.12: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā āsavo ceva sāsavañca, siyā sāsavañceva no ca āsavo.
vb4:133.15: “āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā cā”tipi, “āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā”tipi.
vb4:133.16: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā āsavo ceva āsavasampayuttañca, siyā āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavo, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“āsavo ceva āsavasampayuttañcā”tipi, “āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavo”tipi.
vb4:133.20: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā āsavavippayuttasāsavaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“āsavavippayuttasāsavan”tipi, “āsavavippayuttaanāsavan”tipi.
vb4:134.3: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā saṁyojanaṁ, siyā no saṁyojanaṁ.
vb4:134.11: “saṁyojanā ceva saṁyojaniyā cā”tipi, “saṁyojaniyā ceva no ca saṁyojanā”tipi.
vb4:134.12: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā saṁyojanañceva saṁyojaniyañca, siyā saṁyojaniyañceva no ca saṁyojanaṁ.
vb4:134.15: “saṁyojanā ceva saṁyojanasampayuttā cā”tipi, “saṁyojanasampayuttā ceva no ca saṁyojanā”tipi.
vb4:134.16: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā saṁyojanañceva saṁyojanasampayuttañca, siyā saṁyojanasampayuttañceva no ca saṁyojanaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“saṁyojanañceva saṁyojanasampayuttañcā”tipi, “saṁyojanasampayuttañceva no ca saṁyojanan”tipi.
vb4:135.3: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā gantho, siyā no gantho.
vb4:135.7: Dve saccā siyā ganthasampayuttā, siyā ganthavippayuttā.
vb4:135.10: “ganthā ceva ganthaniyā cā”tipi, “ganthaniyā ceva no ca ganthā”tipi.
vb4:135.11: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā gantho ceva ganthaniyañca, siyā ganthaniyañceva no ca gantho.
vb4:135.12: Samudayasaccaṁ gantho ceva ganthasampayuttañca, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“gantho ceva ganthasampayuttañcā”tipi, “ganthasampayuttañceva no ca gantho”tipi.
vb4:135.14: “ganthā ceva ganthasampayuttā cā”tipi, “ganthasampayuttā ceva no ca gantho”tipi.
vb4:135.15: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā gantho ceva ganthasampayuttañca, siyā ganthasampayuttañceva no ca gantho, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“gantho ceva ganthasampayuttañcā”tipi, “ganthasampayuttañceva no ca gantho”tipi.
vb4:135.17: Dve saccā siyā ganthavippayuttaganthaniyā, siyā na vattabbā—“ganthavippayuttaganthaniyā”tipi, “ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyā”tipi.
vb4:136.5: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā nīvaraṇaṁ, siyā no nīvaraṇaṁ.
vb4:136.6: Dve saccā nīvaraṇiyā dve saccā anīvaraṇiyā.
vb4:136.12: “nīvaraṇā ceva nīvaraṇiyā cā”tipi, “nīvaraṇiyā ceva no ca nīvaraṇā”tipi.
vb4:136.13: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇiyañca, siyā nīvaraṇiyañceva no ca nīvaraṇaṁ.
vb4:136.16: “nīvaraṇā ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttā cā”tipi, “nīvaraṇasampayuttā ceva no ca nīvaraṇā”tipi.
vb4:136.17: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañca, siyā nīvaraṇasampayuttañceva no ca nīvaraṇaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañcā”tipi, “nīvaraṇasampayuttañceva no ca nīvaraṇan”tipi.
vb4:137.2: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā parāmāso, siyā no parāmāso.
vb4:137.7: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā parāmāsasampayuttaṁ, siyā parāmāsavippayuttaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“parāmāsasampayuttan”tipi, “parāmāsavippayuttan”tipi.
vb4:137.9: “parāmāso ceva parāmaṭṭhañcā”ti, parāmaṭṭhañceva no ca parāmāso.
vb4:137.11: “parāmāsā ceva parāmaṭṭhā cā”tipi, “parāmaṭṭhā ceva no ca parāmāsā”tipi.
vb4:137.12: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā parāmāso ceva parāmaṭṭhañca, siyā parāmaṭṭhañceva no ca parāmāso.
vb4:137.14: Dve saccā siyā parāmāsavippayuttaparāmaṭṭhā, siyā na vattabbā—“parāmāsavippayuttaparāmaṭṭhā”tipi, “parāmāsavippayuttaaparāmaṭṭhā”tipi.
vb4:138.5: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā cittaṁ, siyā no cittaṁ.
vb4:138.11: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā cittasampayuttaṁ, siyā cittavippayuttaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“cittena sampayuttan”tipi, “cittena vippayuttan”tipi.
vb4:138.14: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ, siyā cittavisaṁsaṭṭhaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“cittena saṁsaṭṭhan”tipi, “cittena visaṁsaṭṭhan”tipi.
vb4:138.17: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ, siyā no cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ.
vb4:138.20: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā cittasahabhū, siyā no cittasahabhū.
vb4:138.23: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā cittānuparivatti, siyā no cittānuparivatti.
vb4:138.26: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ, siyā no cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ.
vb4:138.29: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū, siyā no cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū.
vb4:138.32: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti, siyā no cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti.
vb4:139.4: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā upādā, siyā no upādā.
vb4:140.3: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā upādānaṁ, siyā no upādānaṁ.
vb4:140.7: Dve saccā siyā upādānasampayuttā, siyā upādānavippayuttā.
vb4:140.10: “upādānā ceva upādāniyā cā”tipi, “upādāniyā ceva no ca upādānā”tipi.
vb4:140.11: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā upādānañceva upādāniyañca, siyā upādāniyañceva no ca upādānaṁ.
vb4:140.12: Samudayasaccaṁ siyā upādānañceva upādānasampayuttañca, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“upādānañceva upādānasampayuttañcā”tipi, “upādānasampayuttañceva no ca upādānan”tipi.
vb4:140.14: “upādānā ceva upādānasampayuttā cā”tipi, “upādānasampayuttā ceva no ca upādānā”tipi.
vb4:140.15: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā upādānañceva upādānasampayuttañca, siyā upādānasampayuttañceva no ca upādānaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“upādānañceva upādānasampayuttañcā”tipi, “upādānasampayuttañceva no ca upādānan”tipi.
vb4:140.17: Dve saccā siyā upādānavippayuttaupādāniyā, siyā na vattabbā—“upādānavippayuttaupādāniyā”tipi, “upādānavippayuttaanupādāniyā”tipi.
vb4:141.3: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā kileso, siyā no kileso.
vb4:141.14: “kilesā ceva saṅkilesikā cā”tipi, “saṅkilesikā ceva no ca kilesā”tipi.
vb4:141.15: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā kileso ceva saṅkilesikañca, siyā saṅkilesikañceva no ca kileso.
vb4:141.18: “kilesā ceva saṅkiliṭṭhā cā”tipi, “saṅkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā”tipi.
vb4:141.19: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭhañca, siyā saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kileso, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭhañcā”tipi, “saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kileso”tipi.
vb4:141.22: “kilesā ceva kilesasampayuttā cā”tipi, “kilesasampayuttā ceva no ca kilesā”tipi.
vb4:141.23: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā kileso ceva kilesasampayuttañca, siyā kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kileso, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“kileso ceva kilesasampayuttañcā”tipi, “kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kileso”tipi.
vb4:142.2: Dve saccā siyā dassanena pahātabbā, siyā na dassanena pahātabbā.
vb4:142.4: Dve saccā siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbā, siyā na bhāvanāya pahātabbā.
vb4:142.6: Dve saccā siyā dassanena pahātabbahetukā, siyā na dassanena pahātabbahetukā.
vb4:142.8: Dve saccā siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā, siyā na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā.
vb4:142.11: Dve saccā siyā savitakkā, siyā avitakkā.
vb4:142.14: Dve saccā siyā savicārā, siyā avicārā.
vb4:142.16: Tīṇi saccāni siyā sappītikā, siyā appītikā.
vb4:142.18: Tīṇi saccāni siyā pītisahagatā, siyā na pītisahagatā.
vb4:142.20: Tīṇi saccāni siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā na sukhasahagatā.
vb4:142.22: Tīṇi saccāni siyā upekkhāsahagatā, siyā na upekkhāsahagatā.
vb4:143.3: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā kāmāvacaraṁ, siyā na kāmāvacaraṁ.
vb4:143.5: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā rūpāvacaraṁ, siyā na rūpāvacaraṁ.
vb4:143.7: Dukkhasaccaṁ siyā arūpāvacaraṁ, siyā na arūpāvacaraṁ.
vb4:143.14: Dve saccā siyā niyatā, siyā aniyatā.
